column7:
active, مَبْنِىٌّ لِلْفَاعِلِ or لِلْمَعْلُومِ
Part. n.
column9:
active participial noun, اِسْمُ فَاعِلٍ
Adv. m
column10:
adverbial noun, ظَرْفٌ, and sometimes طِفَةٌ; of place, ظَرْفُ مَكَاَ نٍ; and of time, ظَرْفُ زَمَاَنٍ
Agent
column12:
or regular, قِيَاسِىٌّ and مَقِيسٌ
Analogy
column14:
or irregular, غَيْرُقِيَاسِىٍّ and غَيْرُمَقِيسٍ or شَاذٌّ (see “ Dev.”) or نَادِرٌ (see “Extr.”)
Aor.
column16:
applied to a noun and to a verb, جَامِدٌ
App.
column19:
or predicate, مُسْنَدٌ and خَبَرٌ
Broken pl.
column20:
broken plural, جَمْعٌ مُكَسَّرٌ
Coll. gen. n.
column21:
collective generic noun, اِسْمُ جِنْسٍ جِمْعِىٌّ; also called a lexicological plural, جَمْعٌ لُغَوِىُّ
Complement of a prefixed noun
column23:
i. e. attributive, verb, فُعْلٌ تَامٌّ
Conj.
column28:
حَرْفُ عَطْفٍ and حَرْفُ عَاطِفٌ
Contr.
column36:
i. e. having و or ى for the last radical letter, فِعْلُ نَاقِصٌ
Dev.
column37:
deviating ; as in the phrase, Deviating from the constant course of speech (with respect to analogy, or rule, or with respect to usage), شَاذُّ.This term and نَادِرٌ (see “ Extr.”) are often used in the lexicons indiscriminately
Dial.
column39:
dialectic variant of, ii). لُغَةٌ فِى
Dim.
column42:
and epithetic phrase, نَعْتٌ and وَصْفٌ and صِفَةٌ
Ex.
column45:
exposition, شَرْحٌ and تَفْسِيرٌ: the latter particularly applied to an exposition of the Kuran
Extr.
column46:
extraordinary (with respect to analogy or rule, with respect to usage), نَادِرٌ. (See “Dev.”)
Fem.
column49:
genitive case, خَفْضٌ and جَرٌّ
Gen. n.
column50:
generic noun, إِسْمُ جِنْسٍ
Hollow verb
column52:
مُشْتَرَكٌ for مُشْتَرَكٌ فِيهِ
I. q.
column54:
(as opposed to real), إِسْمُ مَعْنىً or simply مَعْنىً
Imitative sequent
column58:
i. e. non-attributive,, فِعْلٌ نَاقِصٌ or فِعْلٌ غَيْرُتَامٍّ
Indecl
column60:
infinitive noun, مَصْدَرٌ
Inf. N. of unity
column61:
مَصْدَرٌ لِلْمَرَّةِ
Inf. N. of modality
column68:
mansoob aor. st, مُضَارِعٌ مَنْصُوبٌ
Masc
column71:
mejzoom aor. st, مُضَارِعٌ مَجْزُومٌ
Metaphor
column75:
noun of unity, وَاحِدَةٌ or وَاحِدٌ
Nom. case
column76:
nominative case, رَفْعٌ
Objective complement of a verb
column79:
passive, مَبْنِيٌّ لِلْمَفْعُولِ or لِلْمَجْهُولِ
Pass. part. n.
column80:
passive participial noun, إِسْمُ مَفْعُولٍ
Perfect pl.
column81:
perfect plural, جَمْعٌ سَالِمٌ also “Sound verb”)
Pl.
column83:
plural of paucity, جَمْعُ فِلَّةٍ
Pl. of mult.
column84:
plural of multitude, جَمْعُ كَثْرَةٍ
Pl. of pl.
column85:
plural of a plural, جَمْعُ جَمْعٍ
Perfect verb
column86:
verb which has not two radicals alike, nor has ء nor و nor ى it for one of its radicals, (See also “Sound verb.”)
Pers.
column88:
or epithet (such as تَامِرٌ or لَابِنٌ &c.), إِسْمٌ عَلَى النَّسْبِ (a kind of relative noun)
Post-classical
column92:
preposition, حَرْفُ جَرٍّ, and sometimes صِفَةٌ
Pret.
column95:
quadriliteral-radical verb, فِعْلٌ رُبَاعِيٌّ
Q. Q.
column96:
quasi-quadriliteral-radical verb, فِعْلٌ مُلْحَقٌ بِالرُّبَاعِيِّ
Q. v.
column98:
مُلْحَقٌ see art لحق
Quasi-inf. n.
column99:
quasi-infinitive noun, إِسْمُ مَصْدَرٍ and إِسْمُ لِلْمَصْدَرِ
Quasi-pass.
column101:
quasi-plural noun, إِسْمُ جَمْعٍ
Quasi-sound verb
column102:
verb having و or ى for its first radical letter, فِعْلٌ مِثَالٌ
R. Q.
column103:
reduplicative quadriliteral-radical verb, فِعْلٌ رُبَاعِيٌّ مُضَاعَفٌ
Real subst.
column104:
(as opposed to ideal), إِسْمُ عَيْنٍ or simply عَيْنٌ and إِسْمُ ذَاتٍ or simply ذَاتٌ
Receptacular noun
column107:
relative noun, إِسْمُ مَنْسُوبٌ or نِسْبةٌ
Simple subst.
column108:
(as opposed to infinitive noun), إِسْمٌ
Sing.
column109:
singular, مُفْرَدٌ and وَاحِدٌ
Sound pl.
column110:
sound plural: see “Perfect pl.”
Sound verb
column111:
i. e. verb which is not of the class termed “perfect,” but which has not و nor ى for one of its radicals: or, as used in the Eyn and several other lexicons, one that has not two radicals alike, nor has و nor ى nor ء for one of its radicals: فِعلٌ صَحِيحٌ (See “Perfect verb.”)
Specificative
column114:
(as correlative of attribute or predicate), مَسْنَدٌ إِلَيهِ
Subst.
column118:
synonym and synonymous, مَرَادفٌ and مَتَرَادِفٌ
Syn. with
column124:
i. e. verb having و or ى for one of its radicals : or, as used in the Eyn and several other lexicons, one having و nor ى nor ء for one of its radical letters: فِعْلٌ مُعْتَلٌ
V.n.
column128: supposed by me to be tropical
